analysis.description:
AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#588-628) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#588-628):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#589-591)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#594-596)
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= LIMIT_PER_USER) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#608-610)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#610)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#588-628) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#616-618)
	-token.transfer(referral,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#623-624)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#645-667) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#662-664)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.refund.refund (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#669) shadows:
	- AnythingAppTokenPreSale.refund (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#667-671)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#588-628):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#589-591)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#591)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#588-628):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#589-591)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#594-596)
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= LIMIT_PER_USER) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#608-610)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#610-611)
	- deposited (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#611-616)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#645-667):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#662-664)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(collected) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#662)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#664-667)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#645-667) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= endTime) (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#659-662)

AnythingAppToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#409-433)
	- /unique_chucks/5/0x0b6e701cd51a9e1b5829a4c4fe2130d60c0c4f6c.sol#416-419
